DOC.brief_summary: This study primarily design evaluate impact AVONEX PEN autoinjector work capacity participant multiple sclerosis ( MS ) start device . This study also evaluate secondary endpoint various patient-reported outcome short-term ( 1 month ) , include adherence , treatment satisfaction convenience , long-term ( 12 24 month ) , include adherence , persistence , quality life ( QOL ) , treatment satisfaction convenience . It also assess health resource utilization MS participant start AVONEX PEN autoinjector , well overall safety/tolerability , correlate secondary outcome primary ( i.e. , work capacity ) .
DOC.criteria: Key Must prescribe AVONEX PEN per local labeling ( Product Monograph ) enrol MS Alliance ( MSA ) program If switch another DMT , must DMT least 6 month Last DMT subject switch must injectable Must able physically demonstrate use AVONEX PEN autoinjector device able selfadminister injection Must give write informed consent . If require local law , candidate must also authorize release use protect health information ( PHI ) Must able understand comply protocol Key Female subject consider become pregnant study currently pregnant breastfeed Current enrollment investigational study involve drug , biologic nondrug therapy Participation clinical study within past 6 month Treatment immunosuppressive regimen ( e.g . cyclophosphamide , azathioprine , methotrexate mitoxantrone ) intravenous immunoglobulin ( IVIg ) last 6 month The recent DMT subject switch noninjectable ( i.e. , oral ) Other unspecified reason , opinion Investigator Sponsor , make subject unsuitable enrollment NOTE : Other protocol define Inclusion/Exclusion criterion may apply .
